creator: mail@stefanheimann.net
text:
I have created a patch for the tar task. It is now possible the
specify a `prefix' attribute in a tarfileset, like in a zipfileset.

Example:

<tar tarfile="test7.tar">
  <tarfileset dir="." prefix="test7-prefix/">
    <include name="test7dir"/>
  </tarfileset>
</tar>

Unit-test and Tar.java are attached.

creator: mail@stefanheimann.net
text:
Created attachment 1078
patch for the tar task

Applied to CVS development tree.  Thanks!  Now, a couple of requests:
- next time, please supply patches using cvs diff -u format.
- Would you be able to provide a patch for issue 
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=5874 also?  This request is
similar to providing a fullpath attribute to tarfileset similar to zipfileset.
creator: umagesh@apache.org
